journal: Aaj kal itna stress ho raha hai exams ko lekar. Roz raat ko sochta hoon ki kaise sab kuch manage karu, par lagta hai sab kuch dikhayi de raha hai. Bus thoda hi waqt hai, phir bhi dar laga hai ki kya sahi se kar paunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut hectic tha. Exam ki preparation ka pressure itna zyada hai ki mujhe neend nahi aa rahi. Har waqt yeh sochta hoon ki kya main sab kuch time pe kar paunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj sirf padhai karte karte thak gaya hoon. Har assignment ka stress itna hai ki sochta hoon ki kya main sab kuch manage kar paunga. Phir bhi kisi tarah se is pressure ko handle karne ki koshish kar raha hoon.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh stress tumhare liye bahut tough hai, lekin yeh yaad rakho ki tum akeli nahi ho. Har kisi ko kabhi na kabhi academic tension face karna padta hai. Bas thoda break lo aur apne aap par vishwas rakho, tum sab kuch handle kar sakoge.

journal: Aaj kal mujhe academics ka bohot stress ho raha hai. Har assignment aur test lagta hai ki meri life ka aakhri chance hai, aur main fail ho jaungi. Raat bhar socha, lekin solutions nahi mil rahe hain.
reflection: Yeh feelings bilkul normal hain, aur tumhein yeh samajhna chahiye ki tum akeli nahi ho. Jab bhi aisa lage, thoda sa break lo, deep breath lo aur apne liye time nikaalo. Tumhare efforts aur dedication zaruri hain, chaahe results kaise bhi aaye.

journal: Aaj exam ki taiyari karte karte bahut stress ho gaya hai. Lagta hai sab kuch intehaak hai, aur kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya ye sab mere liye hai ya nahi.
reflection: It's completely normal to feel overwhelmed, especially during exams. Take a deep breath and remember that your well-being is most important; it's okay to seek help if needed.

journal: 3 November 2023: Aaj bahut zyada academic stress feel ho raha hai. Assignments aur exams ki wajah se sleep nahi ho rahi hai, bas ek hi soch hai ki sab kuch theek se ho jaaye. Samajh nahi aa raha hai, kitna manage karun.
reflection: It's completely normal to feel overwhelmed with academic pressure, and you're not alone in this. Just take a deep breath and remember that your health is important too. Sometimes, stepping back for a moment can help clear your mind and regain focus.

journal: Aaj kal bohot zyada tension hai exams ki wajah se. Har roz naya topic padhte hue lagta hai ki kuch nahi samjha. Mera dimaag kaam nahi kar raha hai, aur yeh pressure mujhe struggle karwa raha hai.
reflection: I understand that exams can be really overwhelming and it's normal to feel stressed. Try to take a break and focus on one topic at a time. Remember, it's okay to seek help if you're feeling lost.

journal: Aaj kal exams ki wajah se bahut stress ho raha hai. Padhai ka pressure itna zyada ho gaya hai ki khaana khane ka mann bhi nahi kar raha. Lagta hai sab kuch hard ho gaya hai aur mujhe manage nahi kar pa raha.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ki tayari karte waqt mujhe bahut pressure mehsoos ho raha hai. Samajh nahi aa raha ki itni saari cheezein kaise yaad karun. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki shayad main sab kuch kharab kar dunga.

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut zyada academic stress feel ho raha hai. Assignments, exams aur lectures ka pressure itna badh gaya hai, ki main khud ko overwhelmed mehsoos kar raha hoon. Kaise handle karun in sabko, pata nahi!

journal: Aaj school mein bohot stress feel hua. Exams ki tension aur assignments ka pressure itna badh gaya hai ki samajh nahi aa raha kya karun. Toh socha, kuch likh leti hoon apne feelings ke baare mein.

journal: 16 March 2023: Aaj college ke exams ke liye padhai karte karte mujhe lagta hai ki main bilkul exhausted ho rahi hoon. Har subject ki pressure se mujhe anxiety hone lagi hai, aur kabhi kabhar toh mujhe lagta hai ki main sab kuch lose kar dungi.

journal: Aaj toh bilkul bhi padhai nahi ho rahi thi. Professors ka pressure aur assignments ka load itna zyada hai ki samajh hi nahi aa raha kya karu. Dil mein anxiety hai, sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai.

journal: Aaj bahut zyada pressure feel kiya. Exams ke liye prepare karte hue lagta hai ki samay nahi mil raha, aur tension badh raha hai. Main sochta hoon ki kya iss sabko handle kar paunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj college ka exam tha aur maine itna pressure feel kiya ki bilkul focus nahi kar paaya. Kal bhi group assignment ki wajah se buddhi kharab ho gayi thi. Lagta hai ki aise hi tension chalta rahega, samajh nahi aa raha kaise handle karu isko.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ki tayyari se itna stressed ho gaya hoon. Samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise sab kuch manage karu, sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai. Diwali ke baad bhi mujhe sirf padhai yaad aa rahi hai.

journal: Aaj kal toh sirf studies ka pressure hai. Exam ki tayyari itni hectic ho gayi hai ki man karta hai bas kisika sath ho, koi toh help kare. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki kya yeh sab kar paunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj kal bohot zyada pressure feel ho raha hai exams ki wajah se. Har din padhai ka stress badh raha hai aur mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kaise handle karun. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch hi bohot mushkil ho gaya hai.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful raha. Exams ka pressure itna zyada hai ki samajh nahi aa raha kya karun. Bilkul focus nahi ho pa raha, saara din sirf anxiety mehsoos hota raha.

journal: Aaj bahut zyada academic stress ho raha hai. Assignments aur exams ka pressure itna badh gaya hai ki mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kya karun. Bas aisa lagta hai ki sab kuch chhod doon.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ka stress bahut zyada hai. Lagta hai sab kuch pending hai aur time kam hai, bas matar paneer aur pakode khane ka mann ho raha hai. Koi motivation nahi mil raha hai, samajh nahi aa raha ki kya karun.

journal: Aaj kal bohot zyada pressure mehsoos kar raha hoon academics ki wajah se. Assignment submissions aur exams ka tension sab kuch milake mujhe thakaa raha hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch itna overwhelming ho gaya hai ki aage chalna mushkil hai.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ki taiyari karte waqt bohot stressed feel kar raha hoon. Mujhe lagta hai ki sab kuch mere liye bohot zyada hai aur samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise manage karun. Bas abhi bas chill karna hai thoda, par ye thoughts mujhe disturb kar rahe hain.

journal: Aaj poora din padhaai ki wajah se stress hua hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki exams ke liye samay kaafi kam hai aur koi bhi topic samajh nahi aata. Thoda anxious feel kar raha hoon aur kaise manage karu ye sab nahi samajh aata.

journal: Aaj college ki exam ki taiyari karte karte bohot stress feel hua. Itna syllabus hai ki samajh nahi aa raha kahan se shuru karoon. Lagta hai kuch nahi hoga is baar, bas anxiety hi hoti ja rahi hai.

journal: Aaj kal toh bas padhai hi dimaag me hai. Exam ki tension itni zyada hai ki khud se baat karna bhi bhool gaya hoon. Har din lagta hai ki deadline paas aa rahi hai aur main kuch nahi kar raha.

journal: Aaj kal bas padhaai ka stress hota hai. Exams ke liye itna pressure hai ki sahi se soch bhi nahi paa raha hoon. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main sab kuch behtar kar sakta hoon, par fear of failure bahut zyada hai.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki exams ka pressure bahut zyada hota hai, lekin apni capabilities par vishwas rakhein. Tumhara hard work zaroor rang laayega, bas thoda self-care bhi karna na bhoolna. Tension ko chhodo, aur apne liye thoda time nikalo.

journal: Aaj phir se mujhe exams ka stress mehsoos ho raha hai. Itna saara syllabus hai, samajh nahi aa raha kahan se shuru karun. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main itni pressure handle nahi kar paaunga.
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajh mein aata hai, exams ka pressure bahut hota hai. Koshish karo ki thoda break lo aur khud ko relax karne ka mauka do. Tumhe yeh karna hai, aur tumhare hard work ka result zaroor milega.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful raha. Padaai ke liye bahut pressure hai, aur lagta hai ki main sab kuch nahi kar paunga. Dil thoda udaas hai kyunki exams bahut nazdeek hain.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki academic pressure kaafi overwhelming ho sakta hai, par tumhe yeh yaad rakhna chahiye ki akele nahi ho, aur kaafi log isi struggle se guzar rahe hain. Thoda break lena bhi zaroori hai, apne mental health ka khayal rakhna mat bhoolna.

journal: Aaj toh pura din study karte karte thak gaya. Kitne assignments hain, aur har subject ka pressure bahut zyada hai. Samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise manage karun sab kuch.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh stressful time hai aur tumhe bahut pressure feel ho raha hoga. Thoda break lo, khud ko recharge karo, aur phir se fresh start karo. Tum kar sakte ho!

journal: Aaj kal exams ki wajah se bahut stress ho raha hai. Har waqt padhai karna pad raha hai aur samajh nahi aa raha ki sab kuch kaise manage karun. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main haar jaunga.
reflection: Yeh feeling bahut common hai, aur tumhein akela mehsoos nahi karna chahiye. Thoda break lo, fresh air mein jao ya apne doston se baat karo. Remember, tum jitna effort doge, utna hi acha hoga, par खुद की mental health ko bhi priority do.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ki padhai karte karte dimaag bhaari ho gaya. Lagta hai sab kuch bhool jaungi, bas stress badhta ja raha hai. Kahi na kahi khud par yakin karna mushkil hota ja raha hai.
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajh sakti hoon ki academic pressure kabhi kabhi kita stressful ho sakta hai. Khud par thoda vishwas rakho, aisa nahi hai ki sab kuch tum akeli hi handle kar rahi ho. Tumhare efforts zaroor rang layenge, bas thoda patience rakho.

journal: Aaj phir se padayi ka pressure mehsoos kiya. Exams ke liye itne saare topics hai ki mann nahi kar raha hai, aur stress badh raha hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main relate nahi kar pa raha hoon sabke saath jo itne focused hai.
reflection: Ye feeling bahut common hai, aur isme koi burai nahi hai. Stress ko manage karne ke liye choti breaks lena zaroori hai, aur tumhe apne aap ko thoda space dena chahiye. Tumhe jo kuch bhi feel ho raha hai, uska samna karna achha hai, aur tum ise zaroor overcome kar sakte ho.

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut zyada academic stress feel ho raha hai. Jitna bhi padta hoon, lagta hai koi kuch nahi samajh pa raha. Assignment deadlines aur exams ki tension se kaafi pareshan hoon.
reflection: Yeh bahut common hai, aur tumhe aisa feel hona samajh aata hai. Thoda break lo, aur apne efforts par focus karo, tumhe zaroor success milegi.

journal: Aaj mera exam hai aur mujhe bahut nervous feel ho raha hai. Pichle 2 hafton se main sirf padhai kar raha hoon, lekin abhi bhi lagta hai ki maine itna nahi kiya hai. Aisa lag raha hai ki pressure bahut zyada hai aur maine khud ko bhoot distract kiya hai.
reflection: It's completely normal to feel nervous before an exam, especially when you've put in so much effort. Remember, you are doing your best, and it's okay to not feel 100% ready. Just take a deep breath, trust yourself, and give it your best shot!

journal: Aaj maine college ke assignments aur exams ke baare mein soch ke pura din stress feel kiya. Har jagah bas deadlines ka pressure hai aur kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main handle nahi kar paa raha hoon. Koi bhi kaam khatam karne se pehle hi naya kaam aa jaata hai, bahut zyada bhari lag raha hai.
reflection: Yeh feeling bilkul samajh aa raha hai, academic pressure ka saamna karna sabke liye mushkil hota hai. Yeh zaroori hai ki aap apne liye thoda time nikalo aur stress ko manage karne ke ways dhoondho. Tumhe woh support milega jo is struggle se nikalne mein madad karega.

journal: Aaj bohot zyada stress feel ho raha hai exams ki wajah se. Padhai ka pressure itna zyada hai ki kabhi kabhi lagta hai sab kuch khatam ho jaega. Bas ek-sahi din nahi guzara main, mind itna cluttered hai ki concentrate karna mushkil ho raha hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki exams ka pressure kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Yeh sab feel karna normal hai, bas thoda break le lo aur khud ko recharge karo. Tume apni capabilities par vishwas rakhna chahiye, tum kar sakte ho.

journal: Aaj kal college ka kaam itna zyada hai, ki mujhe bohot stress feel ho raha hai. Har din naya assignment aata hai aur mujhe lagta hai main kabhi bhi time par sab kuch complete nahi kar paaunga.
reflection: Bohot logon ko aise stressful periods se guzarna padta hai, aur yeh bilkul normal hai. Thoda break lena ya time management techniques try karna shayad aapko help karein.

journal: Aaj bahut stress ho raha hai exams ko lekar. Padhai nahi ho rahi aur jo bhi padhta hoon, wo yaad nahi ho raha. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya main achha kar paaunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj kal bahut zyada pressure feel kar raha hoon exams ko lekar. Har roz yeh sochta hoon ki kya main syllabus complete kar paunga ya nahi, aur is wajah se mind mein bohot saare negative thoughts aa rahe hain.

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut zyada tension ho rahi hai exams ki wajah se. Lagta hai mai itna achha nahi kar paaunga jitna expect kar raha tha sab. Har din sirf padho aur padho, kabhi kabhi break lena bhi zaroori hai na!

journal: Aaj phir se exams ka pressure bahut badh gaya hai. Lagta hai sab kuch karne ke baad bhi mein kuch nahi kar paa raha. Nahi pata kyun, bas stress hi stress hai.

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut zyada academic stress mehsoos ho raha hai. Assignment deadlines aur exams ka pressure itna badh gaya hai ki mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kaise manage karun. Kabhi-kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch itna overwhelming hota ja raha hai.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ka stress ho gaya. Saare subjects ek saath padhne pad rahe hain, aur mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kaise manage karun. Lagta hai main kabhi nahi kar paaunga yaar.

journal: Aaj college ke assignments aur exams ke baare mein sochkar thoda stressed feel kar raha hoon. Din raat padhai karne par bhi kyun nahi samajh aa raha, mujhe lagta hai sab kuch mere control se bahar ho gaya hai.

journal: Aaj phir se studies ka stress mujhe kaafi zyada mehsoos ho raha hai. Kal ka exam hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki maine itna accha nahi kiya hai. Dimaag mein bas ek hi chinta hai - kya main pass ho paunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj bahut zyada pressure feel ho raha hai exams ke liye. Har din padhta hoon, lekin phir bhi lagta hai ki time nahi hai. Kisi din bas chhod ke chill karne ka mann kar raha hai.

journal: Aaj bahut stress feel kar raha hoon. Padhai ka load itna zyada hai ki samajh nahi aa raha kaise handle karoon. Kahi na kahi kuch tension hai jo mujhe distract kar raha hai.

journal: Aaj meri exam ki tayari kuch nahi hui, aur pressure bohot zyada hai. Lagta hai ki sab log mujhe dekh rahe hain, aur main fail ho jaungi. Kya karun, bas samajh nahi aa raha.

reflection: It's completely normal to feel overwhelmed with academic pressure. Take a deep breath and remember that you are doing your best. Just focus on one step at a time, and try to make time for yourself amidst the chaos.

journal: Aaj meri kitne zyada padhai ka tension ho gaya. Exam ka pressure itna zyada hai ki sochta hoon ki kya main sab kuch sambhal paaunga. Lagta hai ki sab kuch mere haath se nikal raha hai.

journal: Aaj kal studies ke chakkar mein itna stress ho raha hai ki roz ka mood kharab hai. Assignment deadlines aur exams ka pressure sab kuch sath aa gaya hai, mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kya karun.

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut stress ho raha hai academics ke liye. Kitne assignments aur projects hain, samajh nahi aa raha kahan se shuru karun. Lagta hai main kabhi bhi time manage nahi kar paunga!

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut academic stress feel ho raha hai. Upcoming exams ki tension aur assignment deadlines ne mujhe pura pressure de diya hai. Lagta hai sab kuch mushkil hai, aur study karne ka mann nahi ho raha hai.
reflection: Yeh normal hai ki aise stress feel hota hai, especially exams ke time par. Apne aapko thoda time do, aur chahe kitna bhi stressful ho, tumhe apne efforts par pride hona chahiye. Thoda break lo aur phir se fresh mind se dosto ya family se mil kar wapas aao.

journal: Aaj college ke assignments aur exams ko leke bohot stress feel ho raha hai. Har time lagta hai ki kuch miss kar rahi hoon, aur pressure itna zyada hai ki concentration bhi nahi hota. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki kya sab kuch sambhal paungi ya nahi.

journal: Aaj kal toh bas exams ki tension hi chhayi hui hai. Sari raat padhai karna, par phir bhi lagta hai ki kuch samajh nahi aata. Thoda anxiety feel ho rahi hai, kya karun?

reflection: I understand how overwhelming it can be to juggle multiple assignments and the pressure of deadlines. Take a deep breath and remember to break things down into smaller tasks. You got this, and it's okay to reach out for help if needed.

journal: Aaj kal itna academic stress ho gaya hai ki bas din raat padhai ki sochti rehti hoon. Exams ke liye preparation karte karte mein khud ko bhool rahi hoon. Kabhi kabhi sochti hoon ki kya yahi success ka raasta hai?

journal: Aaj kal ki padhai ka stress bahut zyada ho gaya hai. Exams ki dates aane lagi hain aur mujhe lagta hai ki main prepare nahi kar pa raha hun. Kabhi sochta hun ki kya main sab kuch handle kar paunga ya nahi.

journal: 14 October 2023: Aaj school ki assignments khatam karne mein bahut stress feel ho raha hai. Sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai, ki mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kahan se shuru karun. Kya main really itna kar paungi?!
reflection: It's completely okay to feel overwhelmed sometimes; hum sab iss se guzar te hain. Just remember to take small breaks, and prioritize your tasks. You are stronger than you think, and it's important to be kind to yourself during these stressful times.

journal: Aaj se mujhe exams ki preparation ke liye bahot stress ho raha hai. Har din sochta hoon ki main sab kuch kaise manage karunga, aur samajh nahi aa raha ki kis tarah se focus karoon. Lagta hai kisi tarah se time hi nahi mil raha hai sab kuch cover karne ke liye.
reflection: Itna stress hona bilkul samajh aata hai, exams ka pressure bahar se kuch zyada hi hota hai. Thoda break lena aur apne aap ko chill karne ka time dena bhi zaroori hai, so that you can come back with a fresh mind. Maan lo, tumhe yeh sab handle karne ki ability hai, bas apne par trust rakho!

journal: Aaj kal exams ki tension bahut zyada ho gayi hai. Har roz late tak padhai karti hoon, par phir bhi lagta hai ki kuchh nahi ho raha. Kabhi kabhi sochti hoon ki kya main yeh sab kar paungi ya nahi.

journal: Aaj kal kai assignments aur exams se itna stress ho raha hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai sab kuch handle karna mushkil hai, aur isi wajah se poora mood down hai.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful raha. Exams ki preparation karte karte main thak gaya hoon, aur kuch samajh hi nahi aa raha. Mujhe lagta hai ki main kabhi nahi kar paaunga itna saara syllabus cover.

journal: Aaj maine pura din study kiya, par har waqt samajh nahi aaya ki kya karna hai. Exam ka stress itna zyada hai ki mujhe neend bhi nahi aa rahi. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki shayad main fail ho jaaunga.

journal: Aaj mujhe apne assignments ki wajah se bahut stress ho raha hai. Time management ke liye kaam karte hue bhi samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise sab kuch complete karu. Lagta hai sab kuch mere control se bahar ho gaya hai.

journal: Aaj college ke exams ka stress bahut zyada ho gaya. Lagta hai main kabhi nahi kar paunga ye sab, sab kuch itna overwhelming hai. Preparation ka pressure aur deadlines ke beech mein kaise manage karun, samajh nahi aa raha.

journal: Aaj bahut zyada pressure feel ho raha hai. Sab subject ka syllabus itna bada hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki time nahi hai sab kuch achieve karne ka. Maine socha tha ki main better manage kar paungi, lekin ab bas confusion hai.

reflection: It's completely okay to feel overwhelmed sometimes; these feelings are valid and common among students. Just remember to take a step back, breathe, and tackle things one at a time. You’re not alone in this; support is around you.

Stress ho raha hai aur bas ek hi soch hai ki exams ke time kaise clear kar sakta hoon. Bahut pressure feel ho raha hai, dost log bhi keh rahe hain ki mujhe thoda chill karna chahiye lekin mujhe nahi pata kaise.

It's important to take a step back and breathe; remember, it's okay to seek help from friends or teachers and to give yourself some breaks. You're doing your best, and sometimes that's more than enough.

journal: Aaj university mein exams ka stress bohot zyada tha. Lagta hai sab kuch samajh nahin aa raha hai, aur kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki main sab kuch kharaab kar doonga. Par phir mann ko samjhaata hoon ki thoda relax karne ki zaroorat hai.

journal: Aaj kal exams ki tension bahut zyada ho gayi hai. Har din kuch na kuch naya seekhna par raha hoon, par phir bhi lagta hai ki main kuch khud ko nahi samjha paa raha hoon. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya sab isi tarah se struggle karte hain?
reflection: Yeh feelings bahut common hain, aur aap akeli nahi ho. Academia ka pressure sab pe hota hai, lekin apne aap ko time dena bhi important hai. Thoda relax karne ki koshish karo aur yeh socho ki aapne kitna kuch seekha hai already.

journal: Aaj maine apne assignments ke liye bahut late tak padhai ki, par ab bhi mujhe lagta hai ke main sab kuch sambhal nahi paa raha hoon. Stress itna hai ke kabhi kabhi toh kuch samajh hi nahi aata. Pata nahi kaise time manage karoon.
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajhna aasan nahi hai, par tumhare efforts sabse important hain. Thoda break lena aur apne thoughts ko organize karna bhi utna hi zaroori hai. Tum is waqt ke pressure ko kaise manage karte ho uski ek plan banao aur dheere dheere aage badhne ki socho.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ke pressure ki wajah se bahut stress ho raha hai. Sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai ki mann tha ki kabhi na uthoon. Padhayi ki pressure ke saath, time management karna bhi mushkil hota ja raha hai.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh waqt kitna challenging hai, lekin tumhe apne efforts par vishwas rakhna chahiye. Thoda break lo, relax karo aur phir se focus karne ki koshish karo. Tumhe yeh sab manage karne ka power hai, bas apne aap par vishwas rakho.

journal: Aaj phir se stress ho raha hai exams ki wajah se. Lagta hai sab kuch difficult hota ja raha hai aur time bilkul nahi hai revision ke liye. Kabhi kabhi toh sochta hoon ki mujhe akele hi kyun itna pressure le raha hoon.
reflection: Yeh sab feelings bilkul normal hai, bahut logon ko aise waqt mein stress hota hai. Tumhe apne aap par believe karna chahiye, kyunki tumhari mehnat zaroor rang laayegi. Thoda break lo, inhale-exhale karo, thik lag raha hai toh focus ke saath tayyari karo.

journal: Aaj mere doston ke saath study karte waqt mujhe realize hua ki kitna pressure hai exams ka. Dil kar raha hai bas chill karun, par pata hai ki mehnat karna bhi zaroori hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch mere haath se nikal raha hai.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki academic stress bahut challenging hota hai, lekin tumhara effort important hai. Thoda break lena bhi accha hai, stress se nikalne ke liye zaroori hai. Tumhari mehnat zaroor rang laayegi, bas apne upar vishwas rakho.

journal: Aaj college mein bahut zyada pressure feel ho raha tha. Exams ki taiyari ki wajah se mind itna stressed hai ki kuch samajh nahi aa raha. Lagta hai sab kuch kabhi bhi handle nahi kar paunga.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh sab feeling bohot tough hoti hai, lekin akele nahi ho. Apne stress ko share karna ya breaks lena bhi kabhi kabhi bohot helpful hota hai. Tumhari mehnat zaroor rang laayegi, thoda patience rakhna.

journal: Aaj maine poora din padhai kiya lekin kuch bhi samajh nahi aaya. Mujhe itni tension ho rahi hai exam ke liye ki subah se raat tak sirf syllabus ke baare mein sochta rehta hoon. Aisa lagta hai ki main kabhi nahi kar paunga ye saara kaam.
reflection: It's completely normal to feel overwhelmed with studies, especially when exams are around the corner. Remember, you're doing your best, and taking breaks can really help clear your mind. Just take it one step at a time, and don't hesitate to reach out for help if you need it.

journal: Aaj school mein bohot stress feel kiya, kyunki mujhe exams ke liye tayari karni hai par samajh nahi aa raha hai kaise karun. Sab log itne focused hain, aur main sirf pressure mehsoos kar raha hoon. Kabhi-kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch thoda overwhelming ho raha hai.
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajhna zaroori hai ki ekin do baar jab tak zyada pressure hota hai, tab kisi bhi cheez ko manage karna mushkil hota hai. Thoda break lekar relax karne se ya kisi se baat karne se aapka perspective clear ho sakta hai. Aap akela nahi ho, yeh feelings sabke sath hoti hain!

journal: Aaj kal exams ka stress bohot zyada ho gaya hai. Padhai itni demanding hai ki kabhi kabhi lagta hai main kuch nahi kar paaunga. Sab chizhein sahi se manage karna mushkil ho raha hai.

journal: Aaj kal studies ki wajah se itna stress feel kar raha hoon. Har subject ka syllabus bahut bada hai aur samajh nahi aa raha kahan se shuru karun. Thoda time milta hai toh bhi brain sahi se kaam nahi kar raha hai.

journal: Aaj exam ki tayari karte waqt, itna pressure feel ho raha tha. Har subject ki syllabus kitni badi hoti ja rahi hai, samajh nahi aa raha ki kab tak handle kar paunga. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main sab kuch chhod doon.

journal: Aaj school ki exam ka schedule aaya, aur mujhe bahut stress ho raha hai. Lagta hai ki mujhe sab kuch padhne ka time nahi milega, aur mere dimaag mein khayal aa rahe hain ki main fail ho jaungi. Kabhi kabhi mujhe lagta hai ki itna pressure sahi nahi hai.
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajhna zaroori hai ki exam ka pressure sab par hota hai. Apne aap ko thoda time do, shayad aapko break le kar relax karne ki zaroorat hai. Aapki mehnat zaroor rang laayegi, bas aapko apne upar thoda vishwas rakhna hoga.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful raha. Exam ki taiyari karte karte mujhe lagta hai ki main overwhelmed ho raha hoon. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya main is sab ko handle kar paunga ya nahi.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh samay thoda challenging hai, lekin tumhe apne efforts par vishwas rakhna hoga. Har kisi ko aise pareshaniyan hoti hain, lekin tum apna best doge toh sab theek hoga. Thoda break lo, take care of yourself.

journal: Aaj my math ka test tha aur mujhe bahut tension ho raha tha. Lagta hai ki saari preparation waste ho gayi, bas paper dekh ke hi panic ho gaya. Kya karein, kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki pressure itna badh jaata hai ki focus hi nahi kar pata.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki ye stress kaafi natural hai aur tumhare liye bhi aasan nahi hoga. Yaad rakho, ek test se sab kuch prove nahi hota, aur tumne jo mehnat ki hai, woh kabhi waste nahi hoti. Bas apne aap ko thoda time do, sab kuch theek hoga.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful tha. Exams ki tayyari karte karte mujhe lagta hai ki sab kuch mere haath se nikal raha hai. Bahut zyada pressure feel kar rahi hoon, aur kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main sab kuch khud hi sambhal nahi pa rahi hoon.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki aisa feel karna bilkul normal hai. Academic stress se jitna ho sake handle karne ki koshish karo, lekin apne liye thoda waqt nikaalna bhi zaroori hai. Tumhe apni feelings ko express karne ka mauka mila hai, aur yeh pehla kadam hai khud ko sambhalne ka.

journal: Aaj kal bahut zyada academic stress ho raha hai. Exams ki tension aur assignments ki deadline ne mujhe bahut pareshan kar diya hai. Sahi se concentrate nahi kar paa raha hoon, aur nerousness kaafi badh gayi hai.
reflection: Yeh bilkul normal hai, jab hum itne saare pressures face kar rahe hote hain. Koshish karo ki chhoti breaks lo aur apne mental health ka khayal rakho. Tumhare efforts important hain, aur sab kuch sahi hoga.

journal: Aaj kal exams ka pressure itna zyada hai ki mein soch bhi nahi paa raha. Har waqt notes padhta hoon, fir bhi lagta hai kuch miss ho raha hai. Yeh academic stress mujhe bahut pareshan kar raha hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki agar aapko aisa feel ho raha hai, toh wo bilkul theek hai. Aapki mehnat zaroor rang layegi, thoda break lo aur khud ko relax karne do. Tumhe khud par vishwas rakhna hoga, sab kuch theek hoga.

journal: Aaj college mein exam ka pressure bahut badh gaya. Padhai karne ka mann nahi kar raha, bas tension hi ho raha hai ki kaise sab kuch kar paunga. Lagta hai main kabhi bhi ready nahi ho paunga.
reflection: Main samajh sakta hoon ki abhi tumhe kaisa lag raha hoga. Exam stress kaafi overwhelming ho sakta hai, par tumhe bas apne upar vishwas rakhna hai. Breaks lo aur mind ko fresh karo, sab kuch manageable ho jayega.

journal: Aaj kal studies ka bahut stress ho raha hai. Har subject ka syllabus itna bada hai ki samajh nahi aa raha kaise manage karun. Dil karta hai thoda break loon lekin phir bhi assignments ki yaad aati hai.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai yeh waqt kitna tough ho sakta hai, lekin thoda break lena bhi zaroori hai. Apne aapko pressure se free karne ke liye kabhi kabar chhoti si break lena achha hota hai, phir tumhe nayi energy milegi.

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut stress feel ho raha hai. Exams ke liye itna padna hai ki sirf din-rat main book ke saath hu. Lagta hai ki main kabhi finish nahi kar paunga, aur yeh pressure bahut unbearable hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki academic stress kitna challenging hota hai, lekin thoda break lena bhi zaroori hai. Tumhare efforts bahut important hain, aur tumhe apne aap par trust rakhna chahiye. Thoda relax karo, sab theek ho jayega.

journal: Aaj college mein bahut stress ho gaya. Exams ki preparation ki wajah se soch soch ke mind kaafi overload ho gaya hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki mujhe sab kuch chhod dena chahiye.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki aap kaisa feel kar rahe hain, ye waqt tough ho sakta hai. Thoda break lena zaroori hai, kuch deep breaths lo aur stress ko manage karne ki koshish karo. Aap isse paar kar sakte hain, bas akele nahi hai!

journal: Aaj phir se exams ki tension ho rahi hai. Lagta hai saari duniya ki expectations mere upar hain, aur mein khud ko pressure mein feel kar raha hoon. Samajh nahi aa raha, kaise handle karu is stress ko.
reflection: Ye sab feel karna bilkul normal hai, aur aise moments mein thoda sa break lena zaroori hai. Khud par pressure mat daalo, choti-choti cheezen le lo aur apne interest ke liye bhi time nikaalo. Sab kuch thik ho jayega.

journal: Aaj kal academics ka pressure bahut zyada ho gaya hai. Assignment deadlines aur exams ke chakkar mein sleep bhi miss ho rahi hai. Main khud ko itna stressed feel kar raha hoon ki kuch aata hi nahi hai samajh mein.
reflection: Tumhare emotions bilkul valid hain. Academic stress kaafi challenging hota hai, lekin yaad rakho, thoda break lena bhi zaruri hai. Apne liye time nikaalo, aur koi relaxation activity karo, chahe wo music sunna ho ya thodi der walk par jaana.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful tha, exam ke liye padhai karte karte baaki sab kuch bhool gaya hoon. Lag raha hai ki time nahi hai, aur pressure bhi bahut hai. Khud par bhi jyada expect kar raha hoon, par kabhi kabhi thoda break lena bhi zaruri hai.
reflection: Main samajhta hoon ki academic stress hona ek natural cheez hai, par thoda time apne liye nikalna bhi important hai. Acha hoga agar aap apne stress ko manage karne ke liye kuch relaxation techniques apply karein. Yaad rakhein, aapki mental health sabse pehle aati hai.

journal: Aaj pura din sirf studies ke baare mein socha. Lagta hai ki mujhe zyada pressure ho raha hai, assignments aur exams ki wajah se. Ab itna stress ho raha hai ki maza nahi aa raha kuch bhi karne mein.
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajh sakta hoon ki kabhi kabhi itna stress hona normal hai, lekin zaruri hai ki aap thoda break lein. Apne liye time nikaalein aur apne hobbies ki taraf bhi dekhein. Sab kuch theek ho jayega.

journal: Aaj phir se ek bada exam hai aur mere dimaag mein bahut saari cheezein chal rahi hain. Lagta hai ki main bilkul ready nahi hoon, yeh stress toh mujhe kha jaata hai. Bas yeh sochta hoon ki agar main fail ho gaya toh kya hoga.
reflection: Yeh feeling bilkul normal hai, bahut se students is situation se guzar rahe hain. Apne stress ko sambhalna zaroori hai, thodi der ke liye break lo aur apne wellbeing ka khayaal rakho. Tumhe apni mehnat par vishwas rakhna chahiye, sab kuch theek hoga.

journal: Aaj ka din bohot stressful tha. Exams ke liye tayyari karte karte lagta hai sab kuch bhool jaata hoon, aur tension bhi bohot zyada ho gaya hai. Abhi bhi ek choti si chapter padhna baaki hai aur dil nahi kar raha hai.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki academic stress bohot challenging hota hai. Lekin thoda break lena aur khud ko relax karna zaroori hai. Tumhe apne hard work par garv hona chahiye, aur tumhe pata hai ki tum best kar rahe ho.

journal: Aaj pura din study karte karte bahut stress ho gaya. Exam ki tayari ka pressure itna zyada hai ki kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya main sab kuch kar paunga ya nahi. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki mere liye ye sab manage karna impossible hai.
reflection: Main samajh sakta hoon ki academic pressure kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Yeh normal hai ki aapko kabhi kabhi aisa feel hota hai, bas thoda break lo aur apne aapko recharge karo. Aap zarur isse overcome kar paoge!

journal: Aaj kal studies ka pressure bahut zyada hai. Har subject me acha karne ki chinta mujhe neend nahi aane de rahi hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main sab kuch lose kar dunga.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki kabhi kabhi academic stress itna overwhelming ho jata hai ki humare dimag me sirf usi ki soch rehti hai. Thoda break lena aur apne aapko recharge karna zaroori hai, kyunki tumhari mental health bhi utni hi important hai jitni acchi grades.

journal: Aaj kuch zyada hi pressure feel ho raha hai exams ko le kar. Har jagah sirf padhai aur competition ki baatein sun raha hoon, aur lagta hai ki main sab kuch miss kar raha hoon. Ek taraf se padhai zaruri hai, par kaisa stress hota ja raha hai, samajh nahi aa raha.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh stress kaafi overwhelming hota hai, par thoda break lena bhi zaruri hai. Tumhe apni health ka khayal rakhna chahiye, aur har cheez me balance banana chahiye. Yeh exam bhi ek phase hai, isme jo tumhe seekhne ko milega wo kabhi bhi tumhari madad karega.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful tha. Exam ki taiyaari karte karte mujhe lagta hai ki sab kuch mere haath se nikal raha hai. Sab kuch yaad karne ki koshish karte karte mera dimaag overload ho gaya hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki academic stress kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. It's really important to take breaks and prioritize self-care during such times. Tumhare efforts ki kadar hai, aur tumhe is time pe thodi space aur comfort milna chahiye.

journal: Aaj college ke assignments aur exams ki prep karte karte bahut stress ho raha hai. Lagta hai sab kuch ek saath aane wala hai aur main ready nahi hoon. Din bhar is tension mein hi guzra ki kuch karna hai lekin sab kuch itna overwhelming lagta hai.

journal: Aaj bahut zyada academic stress feel ho raha hai. Exams bas kuch din door hain aur main abhi tak kuch bhi revise nahi kar paya. Lagta hai sab kuch mere upar aa raha hai, asli tension ho gayi hai.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh stress kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Koshish karo ki akele mat raho, friends ya family se baat karo aur unse madad lo. Thoda sa break lena bhi zaroori hai, isse clarity milegi.

journal: Aaj ka din bohot stressful tha. Exams ki tayyari mein itna pressure hai ki kabhi kabhi lagta hai sab kuch chhod doon. Feeling anxious about my grades and future.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh sab aasan nahi hai, par tumhe yeh samajhna chahiye ki tum akele nahi ho. Har koi kabhi na kabhi stress feel karta hai, aur yeh waqt bhi guzar jayega.

journal: Aaj school mein bohot stress feel ho raha tha. Exams ke liye preparation karte karte lag raha hai ki sab kuch chaalu hai, par kuch samajh nahi aa raha. Umeed hai kuch zyada karke samajh paunga.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki academic stress kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Yeh important hai ki kabhi kabhi break lo aur apne aap ko relax karne ka mauka do. Tumhe apne efforts par bharosa rakhna chahiye, aur hamesha yaad rakho, tum akele nahi ho.

journal: Aaj kal exam ki tyari karna bahut stressful ho raha hai. Itna overload ho gaya hai ki kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch sambhal nahi paaunga. Bas din raat padhta rehta hoon, par stress kaafi badh gaya hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki academic pressure kitna challenging hota hai. Tujhe thoda time dene ki zarurat hai khud ko, ek break le aur apne hobbies mein bhi time spend kar. Tere hard work ki value hai, aur sab kuch theek ho jayega.

journal: 27 October 2023: Aaj firse exams ka stress bahut zyada ho gaya. Lagta hai ki jitna padhta hoon, utna bhi nahi samajh aa raha hai aur time chalti ja rahi hai. Yeh pressure kab khatam hoga, samajh nahi aata.
reflection: I understand that academic pressure can be overwhelming at times, and it’s okay to feel lost. Aapne jo itna effort diya hai, woh zarur rang laayega. Just take it one step at a time, and remember to breathe.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful tha. Exams ki tayari mein itna pressure feel ho raha hai ki kabhi kabhi lagta hai sab kuch khatam ho jaega. Bas apne time ko manage karne ki koshish kar raha hoon, par kabhi kabar motivation bhi kam hoti hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki exam ke pressure se guzarna kitna challenging hota hai. Apne emotions ko express karna bahut zaroori hai, aur thoda sa break lene se bhi help mil sakti hai. Tumhari mehnat zaroor rang laayegi, bas apne upar vishwas rakho.

journal: Aaj exam ki tayari karte karte sab kuch stress ho gaya hai. Din bhar notes padhke aur kuch samajh nahi aaya, lagta hai kuch achha nahi hone wala. Bhett se tension ho raha hai ki main prepare nahi ho pa raha.
reflection: Yeh stress hona bilkul normal hai, aur tumhe apne emotions ko samajhne ka mauka milta hai. Thoda break lo, fresh air mein jao ya kuch relax karne wali activity karo. Remember, tumhe ye sab handle karne ki strength hai!

journal: Aaj bhi exams ka tension mujhe chhod nahi raha. Kitne saare syllabus hain, aur time bilkul nahi hai. Har din stress badh raha hai, lagta hai kuch nahi hoga iss baar.

journal: Aaj ka din bohot stressful tha. Exams ka pressure mujhe kaafi anxious feel karwa raha hai, aur revision karne ka time bhi nahi mil raha. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch mere haath se nikal raha hai.
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajhne wali baat hai, jab sab kuch pressure mein ho toh handle karna mushkil ho jata hai. Apne emotions ko express karna zaruri hai, aur yaad rakho ki tum akeli nahi ho in feelings se guzarte hue. Thoda break lo, aur apne liye time nikaalo.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ka pressure feel ho raha hai. Dil toh chahata hai ki bas sab kuch aasaan ho jaye, par syllabus itna bada hai ki samajh nahi aa raha kya karun. Pura din padhai karte karte thak gaya hoon.

journal: Aaj kal academics ki wajah se bahut stress ho raha hai. Kitna bhi padho, lagta hai ki kuch aur karne ki zarurat hai aur deadlines toh kabhi khatam hi nahi hote. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya main sab kuch manage kar paaunga ya nahi.

Thodi breaks lo aur apne liye time nikaalo, ye stress thoda kam karne me help karega. Tumhe yeh yaad rakhna chahiye ki tum akelly nahi ho, sabhi students isi phase se guzarte hain.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ka tension bahut zyada hai. Lagta hai ki har subject ka pressure mujhe drown kar raha hai. Samajh nahi aa raha kya karun, sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai.
reflection: Main samajh sakta hoon ki exam ka stress kitna intense hota hai. Thoda break lena aur apne mental health ka khayal rakhna zaruri hai, yeh waqt bhi guzar jayega. Tumhe apne aap par bharosa rakhna chahiye.

journal: Aaj phir se mujhe apne exams ki wajah se extreme stress feel ho raha hai. Har waqt padhta hoon, fir bhi lagta hai ki kuch bhi nahi aata. Samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise cope karun is pressure se.

journal: Aaj maine apni assignment deadlines ko lekar bohot zyada stress mehsoos kiya. Lagta hai sab kuch ek sath ho raha hai aur main handle nahi kar paa raha hoon. Kaha se shuru karun, ya ye sab manage kaise karun, ye hi sochta reh gaya.
reflection: Yeh feelings bohot common hain, aur aap akele nahi ho. Sabko kabhi na kabhi academic pressure ka samna karna padta hai. Thoda breath lo, priorities set karo, aur yaad rakho ke aap apne liye best karne ki koshish kar rahe ho.

journal: Aaj kal toh mujhe academics ka bahut stress ho raha hai. Har din padhai ki wajah se lagta hai jaise kuchh aur karne ka waqt hi nahi milta. Kabhi kabhi toh sochta hoon ki kya main is sabko manage kar paunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj mujhe nafrat ho rahi hai apne homework se. Sirf stress hi stress hai, sab kuch samajh nahi aa raha hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki this baar exam mein fail ho jaungi.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki academic stress kaafi overwhelming ho sakta hai. Thoda break lena aur apne mental health ka dhyan rakhna zaroori hai. Tu sab kuch manage kar legi, bas thoda patience aur self-care chahiye.

journal: Aaj poora din padhta raha lekin samajh nahi aaya. Test ke liye tension ho raha hai, lagta hai time nahi milega sab cover karne ke liye. Koshish kar raha hoon par stress bahut zyada ho raha hai.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ka pressure bahut zyada hai. Nahi samajh aa raha ki kaise revise karoon, sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai. Doston se bhi baat ki, par wo bhi tension mein hain.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ka pressure itna zyada hai ki mujhe sochne ka time nahi mil raha. Padhai ke saath saath anxiety bhi badh rahi hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main sab kuch nahi kar paa raha hoon.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ki tayari karte waqt stress bahut zyada feel ho raha hai. Lagta hai sab kuch mujhe peechhe chhod de raha hai, aur mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki kis tarah se manage karun. Yaar, itna pressure kab tak sahun?
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajh aata hai ki academic stress hota hai, aur tumhara feelings valid hain. Koshish karo thoda break lene ki, ya khud ko kisi activity mein engage karne ki, yeh tumhe achha feel karwa sakta hai. Tumhare liye sab kuch theek ho jayega, bas thoda patience rakho.

journal: Aaj school mein chhote tests ki tayyari karte karte mujhe bahut stress feel ho raha hai. Lagta hai saara pressure mere upar hai aur koi bhi cheez sahi nahi ho raha hai. Kahi na kahi mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki mai kaise manage karun sab kuch.

journal: Aaj school mein exams ka stress bohot zyada tha. Padhai ke liye maine bohot time diya, lekin phir bhi lagta hai ki main sab kuch nahi kar paa rahi hoon. Kabhi kabhi sochti hoon ki kya mujhe yeh sab kuch karne ki zaroorat bhi hai ya nahi.
reflection: Yeh feeling sabhi students ke saath hoti hai, aur tumhe yeh yaad rakhna chahiye ki tumhara acha karna hi sab kuch nahi hai. Thoda chill lene se bhi kabhi kabhi clarity milti hai. Apne efforts par vishwas rakho, tumhe yeh sab kuch handle karne ki shakti hai.

journal: Aaj toh bahut zyada stress ho gaya. Kal exam hai aur mujhe lag raha hai ki main sab kuch bhool gaya hoon. Kafi din se padhai nahi hui aur ab darr lag raha hai ki kya hoga.

journal: Aaj kal kaafi pressure feel kar raha hoon studies ke liye. Exams aa rahe hain aur samajh nahi aa raha kya karu, ghar wale bhi expect karte hain ki main acha karun. Kisi bhi cheez pe concentrate nahi kar pa raha, bas sochta rehta hoon ki time kam hai.

journal: Aaj kal studies ka pressure bohot zyada ho gaya hai. Har exam se pehle lagta hai ki pura syllabus nahi ho payega aur kya karna hai ye samajh nahi aata. Dil se bas thoda break chahiye toh achha lagega.
reflection: Yeh feelings bohot common hain, aur aapka stress samajhna aasaan hai. Thoda sa rest lena zaruri hai, kyunki ek healthy mind se hi achhe results milte hain. Apne liye waqt nikaalne se aapka focus better hoga.

journal: Aaj college mein bohot stress feel kiya. Assignments ki deadline paas hai aur maine abhi tak kuch nahi kiya hai. Bas sochta hoon ki kaise manage karun sab kuch.
reflection: It's totally normal to feel overwhelmed with deadlines and assignments. Just remember to take things one step at a time, and don't hesitate to reach out for help if you need it. You will get through this!

journal: Aaj phir se exams ke liye padhai karte karte stress ho gaya. Lagta hai ki sab kuch time pe nahi ho raha hai aur darr ho raha hai ki kya main achha perform kar paunga. Padhai ka pressure itna zyada ho gaya hai ki mera mood kharab ho raha hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki exams ka pressure kitna zyada hota hai, par aapko apne emotions ko manage karne ki zarurat hai. Thoda break lo, deep breaths lo, aur yaad rakho, aapne itna mehnat kiya hai, sab achha hi hoga.

journal: Aaj kaafi academic stress feel ho raha hai. Itna saara syllabus hai, samajh nahi aa raha kahan se shuru karu. Din raat padhta hoon, par phir bhi lagta hai ki time nahi hai sab kuch cover karne ka.

reflection: Main samajh sakti hoon ki yeh waqt kitna challenging hai, aur aisa feel karna bilkul normal hai. Thoda break lena aur apne liye time nikalna zaroori hai, kyunki aapki mental health bhi equally important hai. Aap apne efforts par focus karo, sab theek hoga.

journal: Aaj maine apne exams ke liye bahut stress feel kiya. Sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai, ki kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya main yeh sab handle kar paunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj bahut stress ho raha hai, assignments aur exams ka pressure toh sach mein unbearable ho gaya hai. Lagta hai ki main kabhi nahi kar paunga yeh sab, sab kuch itna overwhelming ho raha hai.

journal: Aaj bahut stress ho raha hai exams ke liye. Kitna padhoon, samajh nahi aa raha aur mind bhi busy hai. Lagta hai koi help nahi milne wala hai, sab kuch akela hi karna padega.

journal: Aaj college ka assignment submit karne ka deadline tha, aur mujhe abhi bhi samajh nahi aaya kuch topics. Stress bahut zyada ho raha hai, lagta hai sab kuch mere haath se nikal raha hai. Bas sochta hoon ki kya main ye sab manage kar paunga ya nahi.

journal: Aaj college mein exams ka schedule aaya hai aur mujhe bohot zyada stress ho raha hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki itni preparation karne ke baad bhi main fail ho jaunga. Bas soch soch ke mera dimaag pura khatam ho raha hai.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ki padhai ka pressure mehsoos ho raha hai. Bahut zyada syllabus hai, aur mujhe lagta hai ki main time pe nahi kar paaunga. Mere doston se baat karne se thoda achha laga, par stress toh hai hi.
reflection: Yeh normal hai ki exam ka pressure feel ho. Sabko aise moments hote hain, aur tu akeli nahi hai. Thoda break le, deep breaths le aur padhai ko ek step at a time karke aage badh.

journal: Aaj kal bas padhai ki wajah se itna stress ho raha hai. Har exam se pehle lagta hai ki mehnat ka koi fayda nahi hoga, aur ye pressure kabhi khatam nahi hota.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ka pressure mehsoos kiya. Lagta hai sab kuch itna tough ho gaya hai ki main kyun nahi cope kar paa raha hoon. Doston se baat karne ka try kiya, par kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki koi samajh nahi raha hai.

journal: Aaj toh bahut zyada stress ho gaya hai. College ke assignments aur exams ki wajah se mind bilkul block ho gaya hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch handle karna mushkil ho raha hai.

journal: Aaj college ka exam tha aur mujhe bahut stress ho raha tha. Lagta hai main itna achha nahi kar paunga, kyunki padhai ka time hi nahi mila. Bas abhi hi exam se wapas aaya hoon aur dil thoda heavy hai.

journal: Aaj phir se studies ka pressure mujhe bahut stress de raha hai. Itna zyada syllabus hai ki mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kya pehle karu aur kya chhodu. Bas ek hi thought chal rahi hai, 'Kya main sab kuch time pe kar paunga?'

journal: Aaj kafi zyada academic stress feel ho raha hai. Assignments ki deadline nazdeek aa rahi hai aur mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise manage karun. Bas sochta hoon ki fear se kuch nahi hoga, lekin phir bhi pressure kuch zyada hai.

journal: Aaj phir se assignments ka pressure itna zyada ho gaya ki samajh nahi aa raha kya karun. Kal subah ke exams hain aur bas din bhar padhai karne ke baad bhi mujhe lagta hai ki main ready nahi hoon. Lagta hai sab kuch mere haath se nikal raha hai.

journal: Aaj mujhe apne assignments ke liye bahut stress ho raha hai. Lagta hai ki sab kuch ek saath aa raha hai aur mujhe time manage karne mein mushkil ho rahi hai.

journal: 31 October 2023: Aaj phir se exam ki wajah se chhoti si anxiety feel hui. Lagta hai ki sab kuch itna mushkil hai, aur time bhi kam hai. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya main is sabko handle kar paunga?

journal: Aaj school ki assignment ki wajah se bhot stress ho raha hai. Itna kaam hai ki lagta hai sab kuch manage nahi kar paunga. Bas sochta hoon ki kaise deadline se pehle sab kuch complete karoon.

journal: Aaj college mein bahut stress ho gaya. Exam ke liye tayari karna itna mushkil hai, sab kuch time pe nahi ho raha hai, aur friends bhi pressure daal rahe hain. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki main is sab kaise handle kar paunga.

journal: Aaj college ka deadline tha aur pata nahi kyun, mujhe bahut zyada stress ho raha tha. Har subject ka kaam ek saath aagya aur main bechara un sab ko time pe khatam nahi kar paya. Lagta hai mujhe kabhi kabhi break lena padega, warna yeh stress mujhe kha jayega.

journal: Aaj toh bas bahut zyada stress ho gaya. Exam ke liye itna padhna hai aur dimaag lag raha hai ki kuch yaad hi nahi ho raha. Kabhi kabhi sochti hoon ki kya main yeh sab kar paungi ya nahi.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ki tayari karte waqt bahut stress feel kiya. Lagta hai ki sab kuch time par nahi hoga aur mujhe achha score nahi milega. Har din yeh pressure badhta ja raha hai, bahut anxious hoon.

journal: Aaj bahut stress ho raha hai academics ki wajah se. Exams ke liye padhai karte karte kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch overload ho gaya hai. Koshish kar raha hoon ki relax karun, par mindset kuch aur hi hai.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ka pressure itna zyada ho gaya hai. Padhai mein achha karne ka itna stress hai ki kabhi kabhi sochta hoon kya yeh sab itna zaroori hai? Dil karta hai bas sab kuch choď du aur thoda chill karun.

journal: Aaj kal mujhe bahut zyada academic stress feel ho raha hai. Assignments aur exams ki wajah se lagta hai sab kuch overload ho gaya hai, aur mujhe nahi pata kaise handle karun. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki chhod doon sab kuch.
reflection: It's really tough to face so much pressure, and it's okay to feel overwhelmed. Remember, tum akele nahi ho, aur kaafi log isi situation se guzar rahe hain. Bas thoda sa break lo aur khud ko recharge karo, sab thik hojayega.

journal: Aaj ka din bahut stressful raha. Exam ke liye padhte-padhte mujhe lag raha hai ki main sab kuch bhool raha hoon. Kya main itne stress ke saath achha perform kar paunga?
reflection: Yeh samajhna zaroori hai ki stress aapko kabhi kabhi overwhelm kar sakta hai, lekin aapki mehnat aakhir mein rang layegi. Thoda sa break lo, deep breaths lo, aur khud par bharosa rakho. Aap itne achhe se kar sakte ho jitna aap sochte ho.

journal: Aaj kal college ki assignments aur exams ka pressure bahut zyada ho gaya hai. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch manage nahi ho raha, aur stress se bas kaam nahi ho raha. Mujhe samajh nahi aata ki kaise relax karu aur focus karu.
reflection: Yeh feeling bilkul normal hai, aur har kisi ko kabhi na kabhi aisa lagta hai. Aapko thoda time lena chahiye, chhote breaks lete rahiye, aur apni priorities set karne ki koshish kariye. Itna pressure mat lo, aap kar sakte ho!

journal: Aaj school mein bahut zyada stress feel kiya. Exams ke liye prepare karna hai, lekin mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise manage karu. Lagta hai ki sab kuch mere se bhaag raha hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki exam stress kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Thoda time lo apne liye, shayad ek break lene se aapko clarity mil payegi. Tumhari mehnat zaroor rang laayegi, bas focus rakhna.

journal: Aaj college ka seminar tha aur mujhe bahut anxiety ho rahi thi. Lagta hai sab mujhe dekh rahe hain aur judge kar rahe hain. Kitni baar socha ki kaash mujhe yeh sab itna stress na hota.
reflection: Main samajh sakta hoon ki academic pressures kabhi-kabhi overwhelming ho sakte hain. Tumhara stress bilkul valid hai, aur yeh zaroori hai ki tum apne liye thoda time nikaalo aur relax karo. Yaad rakho, tum akeli nahi ho is feeling mein.

journal: Aaj bahut stress ho raha hai padhai ke liye. Har subject ki alag tension hai, aur mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise manage karun. Calendar dekh kar lagta hai ki time khatam ho raha hai, aur mujhe abhi tak kahin nahi pahuncha.
reflection: Yeh bilkul normal hai, sabhi students aise time se guzarte hain. Apne aap ko thoda break do aur zaroori cheezein prioritize karo. Tumhe jo seekhna hai, uska pressure lekar chalo, na ki dar ke saath.

journal: Aaj poora din padhai karne ke baad bhi samajh nahi aaya kuch. Stress itna ho gaya hai ki sochta hoon kya yeh sab kar paunga ya nahi. Bas ek baar exams khatam ho jaaye tab toh aaram milega.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh waqt kitna challenging hai, par tumhara hard work kabhi bekaar nahi jaata. Thodi breaks lo, aur apne liye time nikalo. Tumhe jo kuch bhi stress mehsoos ho raha hai, wo bilkul normal hai.

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut zyada academic stress feel ho raha hai. Exams ka pressure itna badh gaya hai ki sahi se soch bhi nahi paa raha hoon. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main sab kuch bhool jaaunga.
reflection: Yeh feelings bilkul samajh aati hain, exam ka pressure kabhi kabhi bahut overwhelming ho sakta hai. Koshish karo ki thoda break lo aur achhe se self-care karo, sab sahi ho jayega.

journal: Aaj class ke baad khudko bahut stressed feel kar raha tha. Assignments aur exams ka pressure aisa hai jaise sab kuch mere upar aa raha ho. Kabhi-kabhi sochta hoon ki kya main is sab handle kar paunga ya nahin.
reflection: Mujhe samajh hai ki academic pressure kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Tumhe pata hai, it's important to take breaks and talk about your feelings. Tum akeli nahi ho, hum sab is samasya se guzarte hain, aur tumhe zaroor support milega.

journal: Aaj college ka assignment poora karne me bahut stress ho raha hai. Lagta hai ki time khatam ho raha hai aur mujhe kuch samajh nahi aa raha. Bas ek hi soch rahi hoon ki kaise submit karun bina kill kiye.
reflection: I can totally understand how overwhelming it can feel when deadlines are approaching. It's important to take a deep breath and remember that you're not alone in this. Try breaking your tasks into smaller parts and focusing on one thing at a time.

journal: Aaj phir se wahin chakar hai, exam ki tyari karna bahut mushkil lag raha hai. Har din naya pressure hai, aur kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch khatam ho jayega agar main nahi kar paya to. Kya khud ko itna stress dena sahi hai?
reflection: Main samajh sakta hoon ki academic stress kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Yeh normal hai ki aapko pressure feel ho raha hai, lekin yaad rakhein, aap akele nahi hain. Aapko thoda break lene ki zarurat hai, apne dimaag ko relax karne ka mauka dena bhi zaruri hai.

journal: Aaj mujhe padhai ka bahut stress ho raha hai. Homework aur exams ka pressure itna zyada hai ki sochta hoon kabhi khatam hi nahi hoga. Koshish kar raha hun ki apne aapko sambhal sakun, par kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab mushkil hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki academics ka pressure kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Yeh zaroori hai ki aap apne emotions ko samjhein aur thoda break lein, shayad koi favorite activity ya hobby karne se aapko relief milega. Remember, you're not alone in this, and it's okay to ask for help if needed.

journal: Aaj college mein bahut stress ho raha tha. Exam ki dates aane lagi hain aur main sab kuch yaad nahi kar pa raha hoon. Feel kar raha hoon ki main sab kuch khota ja raha hoon.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki yeh waqt kitna challenging ho sakta hai, par tumhe apne aapko thoda space dena chahiye. Stress ko manage karna zaroori hai, toh kuch breaks lo aur relax karne ki koshish karo, maybe meditation ya kuch hobbies se.

journal: Aaj bas sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai. Exams ke liye padhai khatam nahi ho rahi hai aur pressure aur badh raha hai. Lagta hai main bilkul nahi kar paunga sab kuch time par.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki aapko kaisa feel ho raha hai. Yeh stress bahut common hai, aur kabhi-kabhi break lena bhi zaroori hota hai. Aap apne aap par thoda pressure kam rakhein, relax karne se aapki concentration better hogi.

journal: Aaj college ka project submission tha aur main bilkul ready nahi tha. Pura week tension tha ki kaise pura karunga, aur ab toh lagta hai sab bekar gaya. Samajh nahi aa raha ki stress kaise handle karun.
reflection: Yeh bilkul samajhna aasan hai ki aise moments mein anxiety hoti hai. It's okay to feel overwhelmed, bas yeh yaad rakho ki tum akela nahi ho. Apne mental health ka khayal rakhna bahut zaroori hai, toh thoda relax karo aur next time ke liye better plan karo.

journal: Aaj firse exam ka pressure mehsoos hua. Lagta hai sab kuch ek saath ho raha hai, assignments bhi hain aur revision bhi karna hai. Dil kar raha hai bas thoda break le loon par time nahi mil raha.
reflection: I can totally understand how overwhelming it can get, especially when everything seems to pile up at once. Remember to take some time for yourself; even a short break can refresh your mind and help you tackle the stress better. You're doing your best, and that's what matters.

journal: Aaj kal exams ki tension bohot zyada ho gayi hai. Har roz study karte karte lagta hai ki kabhi bhi kuch bhi yaad nahi rahega. Bas isi stress ke chakkar me sochta rehta hoon ki ab kya karna hai.
reflection: Yeh stress sabke life mein aata hai, aur tum akeli nahi ho. Important hai ki thoda break lo aur khud ko relax karo, kuch hobbies mein time spend karo. Yaad rakho, tumhe apne efforts pe garv hona chahiye, chaahe result kaisa bhi ho.

journal: Aaj kal kaafi zyada academic stress ho raha hai. Exams ki tyari aur assignments ka pressure mujhe bahut anxiety feel karwata hai. Lagta hai ki kabhi bhi sab kuch handle nahi kar paunga.
reflection: Main samajh sakta hoon ki yeh time kitna challenging ho sakta hai. Thoda break lena aur apne mental health ka khayal rakhna bohot zaroori hai. Aap yeh stress ko manage karne ke liye kuch relaxation techniques try kar sakte hain.

journal: Aaj college ka syllabus dekhkar bahut anxiety ho rahi hai. Itni assignments aur projects hain ki samajh nahi aa raha kyun itna pressure hai. Padhai ke saath-saath personal life bhi sambhalni pad rahi hai, yaar!
reflection: Yaar, aise stressful moments mein sabse zaroori hai thoda break lena. Apne liye time nikaalo, chahe woh ek coffee ho ya thodi meditation. Tumhare efforts ki kadar hai, aur sab kuch manage karna mushkil hai, par tum kar sakte ho!

journal: Aaj kal academics ka stress bohot badh gaya hai. Har exam ki tension hai aur lagta hai ki time kabhi nahi hai. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya sab kuch manage kar paaunga ya nahi.
reflection: Main samajh sakta hoon ki academic pressure kitna overwhelming ho sakta hai. Ye zaruri hai ki aap thoda break lein aur apne mental health ka khayal rakhein. Aap sab kuch manage kar sakte hain, bas thodi planning aur self-care ki zarurat hai.

journal: Aaj kal toh sirf academics ki wajah se stress ho raha hai. Exams ki pressure itni zyada hai ki sochti hoon, kya main sab kuch handle kar paungi ya nahi. Dost log bhi bolte hain ki sab accha hoga, lekin dil ki baat toh alag hai.

journal: Aaj bahut zyada tension ho rahi hai exams ke liye. Maine itni mehnat ki hai lekin fir bhi lagta hai ki kuch nahi ho raha. Dil bahut heavy hai aur samajh nahi aata ki kya karun.

journal: Aaj phir se stress ho gaya exam ke liye. Har baar lagta hai ki preparation kar rahi hoon, par kuch samajh nahi aa raha. Dimaag mein sochti hoon ki kya main sab kuch kar paungi ya nahi.

journal: Aaj ka din bohot stressful raha. Exam ki tayari mein itna pressure feel kar raha hoon ki kabhi kabhi lagta hai main thak jaunga. Sirf ek mistake se sab kuch khatam ho jayega aisa lagta hai.

journal: Aaj school mein bohot zyada pressure feel kiya. Assignments ki deadlines yahaan tak aayi hai ki mujhe samajh nahi aa raha hai kya karu. Har kisi se comparison karte karte main khud ko bhool raha hoon.

journal: Aaj kal academically itna pressure hai ki din bhar study karte karte thak gaya hoon. Sab kuch bhaari lag raha hai, aur deadlines ka soch ke hi anxiety hone lagti hai. Kabhi kabhi toh lagta hai ki yeh sab mere liye nahi hai.
reflection: Mujhe samajh hai ki academic stress kabhi kabhi overwhelming ho sakta hai. Apne aap ko time dena aur thoda break lena zaroori hai, kyunki aapki mental health bhi important hai. Aap akele nahi ho, hum sab isi struggle se guzar rahe hain.

journal: Aaj kal studies ka pressure itna zyada ho gaya hai. Har subject ka syllabus itna bada hai ki samajh hi nahi aa raha kahan se shuru karu. Time kam hota ja raha hai aur tension bhi badh raha hai.

journal: Aaj phir se mujhe samajh nahi aaya ki iss semester ka syllabus kaise complete karunga. Exam ki tension itni zyada hai ki neend bhi nahi aa rahi. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main sab kuch khota ja raha hoon.
reflection: Tumhara stress bilkul samajh aata hai, aur aisa feel karna normal hai. Bas thoda break lo aur cheezein one step at a time karo. Tum apne liye thoda self-care bhi zaroor karo.

journal: Aaj bahut zyada pressure ho raha hai exams ka soch ke. Ghar wale bhi mujhe achievement ki taraf dekhte hain, aur main khud ko unke expectations par khara nahi utar pa raha. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch chhod do yaar!
reflection: Mujhe samajh hai ki tumhe kitni tension ho rahi hai. Koi bhi achievement ki journey mushkil hoti hai, aur tumhara stress bilkul samajh aata hai. It's okay to feel overwhelmed; bas thoda relax karne ki koshish karo, tum isse paar kar sakte ho.

journal: Aaj kal bahut zyada academic stress ho raha hai. Exams ki tayyari karte karte lagta hai sab kuch chhod diya hoon, aur koi motivation nahi mil raha. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon, kya sab kuch itna mushkil hona chahiye?
reflection: It's completely normal to feel overwhelmed with academic pressure, especially during exam time. Remember, it's important to take breaks and give yourself some grace. You are doing your best, and that's what truly matters.

journal: Kal ek important exam tha, aur mujhe itna pressure feel ho raha tha ki meri neend bhi chhut gayi. Padhai ka load itna zyada hai ki kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki main manage nahi kar paaunga. Bas abhi thoda stress se break chahiye.
reflection: Yaar, academic stress sab par hota hai, aur tumhara feel hona bilkul normal hai. Thoda relax karo, break lo, aur apne liye time nikaalo. Tumhe achcha karne ke liye zaroori hai ki tum apna mind bhi healthily recharge karo.

journal: Aaj class mein bahut zyada pressure feel hua. Projects aur exams ki wajah se dimag mein kaafi stress hai, kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch sambhal nahi paaunga. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya yeh sab mere liye itna important hai ya nahi.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki academic pressure kabhi kabhi bahut overwhelming ho sakta hai, lekin tumhe yaad rakhna chahiye ki tum akele nahi ho. Har kisi ko kabhi na kabhi aise feel hota hai, bas thoda break lo aur apne liye waqt nikaalo. Tumharay efforts ki value hamesha rahegi.

journal: Aaj college ka exam tha aur mujhe itna stress ho raha tha ki mujhe nahi pata tha main kya karun. Padhai ke liye itna waqt nahi mila tha aur ab lag raha hai ki sab kuch khatam hone wala hai. Kisi tarah karna hoga bas.
reflection: Tumhara stress bahut samajh aata hai, exam ke time pe aisa feel karna common hai. Bas yeh yaad rakhna, tumne jitna kiya hai, wahi sabse important hai. Ek saans lo aur khud ko relax karne ki koshish karo, sab theek hoga.

journal: Aaj phir se classes mein bahut stress feel hua. Sab assignments aur exams ka pressure itna badh gaya hai, ki sochta hun kab chhuti milegi. Dost bhi busy hain, kisi se baat karne ka time nahi milta.

journal: Aaj exam ke liye padhte padhte mein itna stressed ho gaya hoon ki samajh nahi aa raha kya karu. Kitne assignments bhi hain jo complete karne hain, par motivation bilkul nahi hai. Lagta hai sab kuch mere control se bahar ho gaya hai.

journal: Aaj mujhe bahut stress ho raha hai. Project ki deadlines aa rahi hain aur main samajh nahi paa raha ki kaise manage karu. Har din padhai mein utni hi mehnat karne ke baawajood, lagta hai kuch bhi nahi ho raha hai.

journal: Aaj mujhe apne exams ki wajah se bahut stress ho raha hai. Lagta hai sab kuch itna overwhelming ho gaya hai ki concentrate karna mushkil ho raha hai. Kya yaar, kabhi kabhi bas chill karne ka mann karta hai, par pressure nahi jaata.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki academic stress kitna tough ho sakta hai, aur kabhi kabhi yeh sab kuch bhaari ho jata hai. Relax hone ka waqt zaroor nikaalo, kyonki tumhara mental health bhi important hai. Tumhare efforts ko dekh ke main proud feel karta hoon, aur sab kuch theek hoga, bas thoda time do khud ko.

journal: Aaj ka din bohot stressful tha. Exam ka pressure itna zyada hai ki din bhar padte padte sirf thak gaya hoon. Kabhi kabar lagta hai ki kya main itna tough situation handle kar paunga?
reflection: Mujhe samajh hai ki academic pressure kitna overwhelming hota hai. Tumhe apne aap ko thoda space dena chahiye aur achhe se recharge karna chahiye. Tum is situation ko zaroor face kar sakte ho, bas positive raho aur apne mental health ka khayal rakho.

journal: Aaj phir se exam ka pressure feel ho raha hai. Padhai itni zyada ho gayi hai ki samajh nahi aa raha kaise manage karun. Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki sab kuch drop kar du.

journal: Aaj school mein bahut stress feel ho raha tha. Exams ki tayari zyada hai, aur mujhe laga ki time kam hai. Samajh nahi aa raha ki kaise manage karun sab kuch.

journal: Aaj school me kaafi stress ho gaya. Exams ki tayari karte karte bhi lag raha hai ki main sab kuch bhool jaa raha hoon. Kabhi kabhi to sochta hoon ki kya mujhe yeh sab karna chahiye ya nahi.

journal: Aaj bohot zyada pressure feel kar raha hoon exams ki wajah se. Sab kuch itna overwhelming lag raha hai, ki kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki kya main sab kuch manage kar paunga ya nahi.
reflection: I completely understand how you feel. Exam pressure can be really tough, but remember, aap akeli nahi ho. Take breaks, and try to focus on one task at a time. You will get through this!

journal: Aaj college ki assignments ke liye stress bahut zyada hai. Mein soch raha hoon ki kya sab kuch time par kar paunga ya nahi. Is pressure ne mujhe kaafi anxious feel karwa diya hai.

journal: Aaj kal toh bas stress hi stress hai, exams ke liye prepare karte karte samajh nahi aa raha kya karun. Nights sleepless hain aur mind mein bas sab kuch ghoom raha hai. Pata nahi yeh pressure kaise manage karun!

journal: Aaj bohot zyada stress ho raha hai academics ki wajah se. Assignments aur exams ka pressure itna hai ki sochta hoon kaise manage karun. Har subject mein padhai karna bohot challenging lag raha hai.
reflection: Mujhe pata hai ki academic stress sab ke saath hota hai, par tumhe khud par believe rakhna chahiye. Thoda break lo aur apne routine ko thoda adjust karo, sab kuch manageable ho jayega.

journal: Aaj college ka assignment submit karne ka deadline tha, par mujhe itna stress ho gaya ki maine sab kuch last minute par karna pada. Mujhe lagta hai ki main kabhi bhi time par kaam nahi kar sakta, aur is wajah se meri performance bhi affect ho rahi hai.
reflection: Ye sab sun kar mujhe samajh aata hai ki tumhare liye kitna difficult hai. Time management seekhna hamesha asaan nahi hota, par choti choti steps le kar tum isse improve kar sakte ho. Apne par khud itna pressure mat daalo, tumhara best kafi hai!

journal: Aaj bohot zyada padhai ka pressure feel kar raha hoon. Exam ka time aaya hai aur mujhe lagta hai main sab kuch yaad nahi kar paa raha. Dil thoda udaas hai kyunki I really want to perform well.
reflection: Mujhe samajh aata hai ki academic stress kitna tough ho sakta hai. Lekin yaad rakho, tumhara best effort hi sabse important hai. Thoda relax karne ki koshish karo, sab kuch thik ho jayega.

journal: Aaj phir se exams ki tension bahut ho gayi hai. Koi bhi topic achhe se samajh nahi aa raha hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki main fail hone wali hoon. Is stress se mujhe kaise cope karna hai, samajh nahi aa raha.
reflection: Yeh normal hai ki exams ke time pe stress feel hota hai, lekin sab kuch theek ho jayega. Thodi deep breaths lo, chill karo aur apne study plan ko thoda rethink karo. Tumhari hard work zaroor rang layegi.

journal: Aaj kal kaafi academic stress ho raha hai. Assignments aur exams ka pressure itna zyada hai ki kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki sab kuch chhod doon. Umeed hai ki yeh phase jaldi khatam ho.
